How to Create a Wallet


Setting up the Aion Wallet

  • Navigate to https://wallet.aion.network.
  • Enter a password that will be used to unlock your Keystore file to access your account. It is recommended that you have a password that is easy to remember and it is also advised to keep a backup of the password
  • Click the "Create New Wallet" button.
  • Download your Keystore / UTC file & save this file securely. The keystore file that is available for download is an ecrypted file using the password that was used to create the account, and the password will be needed to decrypt the file to unlock your wallet
  • Click on "I understand. Continue" button after reading the warning text
  • Print your paper wallet backup and/or backup your private key on a physical material such as a piece of paper
    • The paper wallet has the public address of the account just created, this address is also seen when the account is unlocked using the private key or the Keystore file. To view balance you can query your address on .
  • Unlock your new wallet from the Keystore / UTC file on your USB drive or via the private key that you printed out. Ensure it unlocks the wallet you are sent to and matches the bookmark you have.
  • Send a small amount of Aion (0.05 Aion) from this new wallet to another address.
  • Ensure you have recorded all necessary bits of information and the addresses match at all times. If they don't, you mis-wrote something somewhere. That means it's time to start from the beginning in order to make sure you never lose access to your funds.

Doing all of this is complicated, but it ensures you (1) have complete access to your funds (2) the address you sent to is correct and matches the private key you have saved and (3) you can rest easily for years to come, knowing you will be able to access your Aion later.


Safe Storage of Backups

It is recommended that you store backups of both forms of your key (the Keystore / UTC file version and paper wallet version) in physically separate, offline environments.

This prevents loss of the private key & password due to unforseen events


There is no mechanism to recover your key

Aion Wallet is not a web wallet and cannot recover your private key or password, access your account, move funds, recover funds, nor cancel/reverse transactions.

Aion Wallet is a client-side interface that allows you to interact with the Aion blockchain. Please secure & back up your private key, password, and keystore file

Short Version (Advanced Users Only)

  1. Go to https://wallet.aion.network/.
  2. Enter a strong but easy to remember password.
  3. Click the "Create New Wallet" button.
  4. Click the "Download" button & save your Keystore / UTC file. Back it up.
  5. Read the warning. If you understand it, click the "I understand. Continue" button.
  6. You now have the option of printing a paper wallet, saving your private key, or saving a QR code of your private key. Back up at least one (offline).
  7. Then click "Next: Save your Address"
  8. Unlock your wallet that you just created using the Keystore / UTC file you just downloaded or the private key.
  9. Save your address to a text document & bookmark the link to it on dashboard.aion.network.
  10. Ensure all information matches. Don't lose this information and alway cross check
